subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire said he would not object to coming off the bench rather than reassuming his role as the starting power forward, a position currently filled by Carmelo Anthony.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire said he would not object to coming off the bench rather than reassuming his role as the starting power forward, a position currently filled by Carmelo Anthony.
